```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
data_2410 <- read_csv("data/october_2024_sample6k_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
mean(data_2410$duration, na.rm = TRUE)
median(data_2410$duration, na.rm = TRUE)
```


```{r}
ggplot(data_2410, aes(x = duration)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 50, fill = "skyblue", color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Duration")

```

```{r}
qqnorm(data_2410$duration)
qqline(data_2410$duration)
```


```{r}
data_2410_log <- data_2410 %>%
  mutate(log_duration = log(duration + 1))
```


```{r}
mean(log(data_2410$duration + 1), na.rm = TRUE)
median(log(data_2410$duration + 1), na.rm = TRUE)
```


```{r}
qqnorm(log(data_2410_log$duration+1)); qqline(log(data_2410_log$duration+1))
```
